name: Sheet Pan Mango Chicken
description: An easy weeknight meal the whole family will love!
preparation: Preheat oven to 450° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Cut lime in half. In a large bowl, using 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice from lime. Stir in mix, olive oil, and soy sauce to make glaze. Toss chicken in glaze, set aside.
Slice bell peppers. Add bell peppers and mango to glaze; toss to coat.
Arrange evenly on pan. Cook 16–18 min or until chicken is cooked through. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: Make it vegetarian: Swap chicken for two blocks (210 g each) smoked tofu.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
